cms.query.QueryText: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'U' + CAST(CMS_User.UserID AS nvarchar(50)) AS OperatorID, FullName + ' (' + CMS_User.UserName + ')' AS OperatorName, CMS_User.UserIsHidden AS Hidden, NULL AS RoleName FROM CMS_User, CMS_UserSite WHERE (CMS_User.UserName LIKE @Search OR CMS_User.FullName LIKE @Search) AND (CMS_User.UserID = CMS_UserSite.UserID AND CMS_UserSite.SiteID=@SiteID) UNION SELECT 'R' + CAST(RoleID AS nvarchar(50)) AS OperatorID, RoleDisplayName AS OperatorName, 0 AS Hidden, RoleName AS RoleName FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleDisplayName LIKE @Search AND SiteID = @SiteID) AS Operators WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY OperatorName
